title: The Reading Group
description: From the publishers of Rosamunde Pilcher and Santa Montefiore comes a sparkling new voice in commerical women's fiction.A group of friends, a few bottles of wine and a good book. What could be better? The women who form the Reading Group are as varied as the books they choose to read. But each has secret hopes and fears - for a new lover; a straying husband; an ailing mother; a tearaway teenager. Can they find the answers to life's problems in the pages of a good book?
author: Elizabeth Noble
